data.text: Bo dɛɛ gi ma kae, ɗɛi è ʋagai anzaiti pɛ saama,
È ʋagɛ, zìima anzanui, eɠɛ Tiilesa taa ʋapagi,
È-ɲiigaiti ta gàazu eɠɛ baala saa ɓulugi,
È-ɠomagiti kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ gelenade gulu waa ɓɔigi ma ʋalisuiti,
Masagi anzai niiti é ti vuluai,
Nɔ̀un gaazu, anzanui ɠa ɠila kpe nɔ eteai zu,
ti ɗa ɠɛ ma: «Anzanui ɓɛ ɠanu,
Gè yeini nɔ feya gwaa wulu ɓelei zu,
Kɛlɛ gè la kwɛɛni, ʋelei zìima vai dàaʋiligai la,
